info.title: MSWA Project API
info.description: API for managing currencies and countries with versioning support

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all current (active) currencies

post.description: Create a new currency with the specified details

409.description: Currency with this ISO code already exists

get.description: Retrieve the current version of a currency by its ISO code
Retrieve the version history of a currency
Retrieve a paginated list of all current (active) countries

post.description: Create a new country with the specified details

409.description: Country with this ISO code already exists

get.description: Retrieve the current version of a country by its ISO code

404.description: Country or linked currency not found

get.description: Retrieve the version history of a country
Retrieve a paginated list of countries that use a specific currency

isCurrent.description: Whether this is the current active version

validFrom.description: Date from which this version is valid

validTo.description: Date until which this version is valid (null if currently active)

currencyIsoCode.description: ISO code of the currency used by this country

validTo.description: Date until which this currency is valid

validFrom.description: Date from which this currency is valid

currencyIsoCode.description: ISO code of the currency used by this country
